callout.title: Resident
description: A modern and convenient way for residents to manage and access daily activities such as  benefits, utility payments, transportation, medical services, and public facilities— all integrated into one tool accepted everywhere that accepts Mastercard.

citykey.bgImageAlt: Background image for Mastercard City Key™ section

p: In cooperation with Mastercard, we offer a unique product that provides residents with access to benefits at any merchant that accepts Mastercard payment cards.

The card serves as a payment card, bank account, and ID to confirm eligibility for benefits. It stores electronic transit tickets, like a local closed-loop card, and functions globally as a Mastercard debit card.
With this card, residents are able to:

ul.text: Use it as a public transportation e-ticket

p: The TransactFleet ticketing solution is used in hundreds of buses across the Baltic states. You can conveniently access tickets for your rides using your Mastercard City Key™ card or the Transact Mobile application, whether you need a QR ticket or simply use your Mastercard City Key™ card to identify yourself and receive an e-ticket right away.
Mastercard City Key™ or the mobile app provide access to:

giftCards.bgImageAlt: Background image for Gift Cards section

p: We provide Mastercard Gift Cards in  cooperation with 15 shopping malls in Latvia.  These cards can be used at those shopping  malls or at any merchant that accepts  Mastercard payment cards. We invite you to  enjoy the freedom and flexibility of the gift that  can be used wherever Mastercard is accepted.
Gift cards can be purchased at information  desks, online (at www.ISTA.lv), or through our  self-service kiosks.
